projects.title: Business Analysis on Rapido Application
projects.description: The Platform as a Service model aligns well with Rapido's existing business structure. By leveraging PaaS, Rapido can efficiently expand into mobile commerce, B2B marketplace, and collaborative commerce.

projects.title: Tweet Categorization using Sentiment Analysis
projects.description: The aim of this project is to develop a sentiment-based recommendation system for tweets, providing users with relevant content aligned with their expressed sentiments.

projects.title: Road Accident Predicting System using Data Mining
projects.description: This project involved analyzing historical accident data to uncover trends and patterns using data mining techniques.

courses.title: Management Information Systems
courses.description: A comprehensive study of managing organizational information systems.

courses.title: Data Mining
courses.description: Techniques for extracting valuable insights from large datasets.

courses.title: Social Media Analytics
courses.description: Analyzing social media data to extract patterns and insights.
